channel.description: Project Introduction SGU TodoList is a task management application built using a Microservices architecture on the AWS Cloud platform. The project was initially designed to be deployed as a Multi-Region SaaS model to ensure high availability and disaster recovery. However, due to budget constraints and AWS Free Tier limitations, the team optimized the architecture for a Single-Region Deployment with a Cross-Region Failover mechanism for the frontend.
